cells.data: -- range :: Ix a => (a, a) -> [a]on range(ab)	set {a, b} to {|1| of ab, |2| of ab}	if class of a is list then		set {xs, ys} to {a, b}	else		set {xs, ys} to {{a}, {b}}	end if	set lng to length of xs		if lng = length of ys then		if lng > 1 then			script				on |λ|(_, i)					enumFromTo(item i of xs, item i of ys)				end |λ|			end script			sequence(map(result, xs))		else			enumFromTo(a, b)		end if	else		{}	end ifend range
